title: P2PInfect botnet activity surges 600x with stealthier malware variants
description: The P2PInfect botnet worm is going through a period of highly elevated activity volumes starting in late August and then picking up again in September 2023. [...]

title: T-Mobile app glitch let users see other people's account info
description: T-Mobile customers today were able to see other people's account and billing information after logging into the company's official mobile application. [...]

title: TransUnion denies it was hacked, links leaked data to 3rd party
description: Credit reporting firm TransUnion has denied claims of a security breach after a threat actor known as USDoD leaked data allegedly stolen from the company's network. [...]

title: Free Download Manager releases script to check for Linux malware
description: The developers of Free Download Manager (FDM) have published a script to check if a Linux device was infected through a recently reported supply chain attack. [...]

title: Fake WinRAR proof-of-concept exploit drops VenomRAT malware
description: A hacker is spreading a fake proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for a recently fixed WinRAR vulnerability on GitHub, attempting to infect downloaders with the VenomRAT malware. [...]

title: Expensive Investigations Drive Surging Data Breach Costs
description: Data breaches and their investigations are becoming extremely costly for the enterprise. Learn from Outpost24 below about what your business can do to reduce these costs. [...]

title: Signal adds quantum-resistant encryption to its E2EE messaging protocol
description: Signal has announced that it upgraded its end-to-end communication protocol to use quantum-resistant encryption keys to protect users from future attacks. [...]
